But as Eric Schmidt put it in a Twitter posting on Thursday( Jan. 20), day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Instead, Eric Schmidt will take on the role of Google's executive chairman, where he says he will focus on broader business partnerships, technology leadership, product development and government outreach.
